mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(id, pw, name, email, birth, gender, fileName, originalName) VALUES(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{fileName}, #{originalName})
mapper.select: select id from member where id=#{id}
select id, name,email, to_char(birth, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as birth, gender, fileName, originalName from member where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.update: update member set pw=#{pw}, name=#{name}, email=#{email} where id=#{id}
